mapper.insert: insert into advantisement (ad_id, ad_name, ad_show, build_time, click_times, end_time, image, release_time, simple_depict, url, detail_depict) values (#{adId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adShow,jdbcType=BIT}, #{buildTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{clickTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{releaseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{simpleDepict,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailDepict,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.select: select ad_id, ad_name, ad_show, build_time, click_times, end_time, image, release_time, simple_depict, url, detail_depict from advantisement where ad_id = #{adId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
